/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky above. A red car is parked on the side of the road, adding a pop of color to the scene. In the distance, buildings can be seen, their architecture hinting at the blend of modern and traditional styles that are characteristic of Beijing. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, enhancing the colors and bringing the scene to life.
